name: BUN 3: Survive the Darkness (playable prototype)
description:
This is the playable prototype for my Capstone project of the 3rd game in the Bun series. These are the modifications made to the game:

  1. 1. All artwork created by me to fit the theme.
  2. 2. All music and SFX created by me with Garageband.
  3. 3. Included a detailed Instructions page in the main menu.
  4. 4. Added invincible enemies to level 2.
  5. 5. Added a flashlight and fog effect so the player's view is limited.

Assets created by Nick Green using Gimp and Garageband.

Scripts created by MSU GEL LAB, 2020.
